info.description: Operations on Aladdin Portfolio Group resource.
info.title: Portfolio Group

get.description: Returns true if the specified portfolio/group is a direct child inside the parent group.

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

result.description: Represents the result of the query.
